SharedMapStringified.title: Shared Map State (Stringified)
SharedMapStringified.description: Represents the serializable state of a map view, stored as a single JSON string.

mapStateJSON.description: The entire map state serialized as a JSON string.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the map was shared. This will be a server timestamp object.

/sharedMaps/{mapId}.description: Stores the state of shared maps as a string. Anyone can read/create.
